explanation: [0-0] Colorful flowers are placed below a pale blue wall.

[0-6] On the right side, a person uses both hands to stick a brown cardboard onto the wall. The cardboard has pre-carved clock numbers and scales. After fixing the four corners of the cardboard with both hands, a hand appears on the right side holding a golden number 1 and places it in the corresponding position on the cardboard. Then, the number 2 and the English word "3" are also stuck on the cardboard. A hand takes the number 4 and places it in the corresponding position on the cardboard, followed by numbers 5 to 7 being pasted in order.
